text: ¶ These be the names of the mighty men whom David had: The Tachmonite that sat in the seat, chief among the captains; the same was Adino the Eznite: he lift up his spear against eight hundred, whom he slew at one time.23.8 The Tachmonite…: or, Joshebbassebet the Tachmonite, head of the three23.8 whom he…: Heb. slain23.8 1ch 11:11 he lift…: from whom he…: Heb. slain
